name: Aave Developers DAO
description: Aave, one of the original pioneers of DeFi, is looking for the next-generation of developers to build and grow the protocol! This journey helps you acquire great understanding of the Aave protocol and governance. *This is an example project. The scores below are not accurate. Feel free to jump in on Github to make this quest a reality.

tasks.name: Create a Web3 wallet
tasks.description: Visit https://ethereum.org/wallets and install a wallet to start your journey.

tasks.name: $AAVE token
tasks.description: Buy and hold any amount of $AAVE tokens in your wallet.

tasks.name: Aave OG
tasks.description: Score points for the # of months ago you've first send a transaction to the Aave protocol.

tasks.name: Deposit Ether
tasks.description: Deposit Ether onto the Aave protocol at https://app.aave.com/#/deposit

tasks.name: Deposit any asset
tasks.description: Deposit any asset onto the Aave protocol at https://app.aave.com/#/deposit

tasks.name: Borrow any asset
tasks.description: Borrow any amount of asset(s) from the Aave protocol at https://app.aave.com/#/deposit

tasks.name: Flashloan
tasks.description: Swap the collatoral on any position using a flashloan.

tasks.name: Healthy position (3 months)
tasks.description: Have maintained a healthy position on the platform for at least 3 months.

tasks.name: Healthy position (6 months)
tasks.description: Have maintained a healthy position on the platform for at least 6 months.

tasks.name: Vote on Snapshot
tasks.description: Participate in (off-chain) governance using Snapshot and vote on min. 1 proposal.

tasks.name: Vote on Snapshot (10)
tasks.description: Vote on a minimum of 10 proposals on Snapshot.

tasks.name: Vote on Snapshot (25)
tasks.description: Vote on a minimum of 25 proposals on Snapshot.

tasks.name: Delegate Voting Power
tasks.description: Delegate your AAVE or stkAAVE Voting Power to any other address.

tasks.name: Delegated Voting Power
tasks.description: Have any amount of Voting Power delegated to you.

tasks.name: Executed Proposal
tasks.description: Have a (positive) vote on any proposal that got executed.

tasks.name: Be a critic
tasks.description: Have a vote against on any proposal.
